title: Sion ult vs lulu polymorph

embed.description: this is just another ridiculous case where i question why i play this champ edit: video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UaAswCTT0UY&feature=youtu.be seems like her polymorph knocks you out of your ult entirely so you cant knock anyone else. weird interaction

body: I am a sion main, and lulu is pretty strong right now, meaning I have been encountering this a lot. Sion's ult clearly states he is immune to all forms of CC, and lulu's polymorph is classified as a form of CC. It would be great if either a clarification can happen or this be fixed if it is a bug. If it is supposed to happen, I can play with it in anticipation of it, but I can't if it is just a bug.

replies.body: Had a conversation about this a few hours ago, this should be fixed next patch.
I am definitely glad that my report is being noticed. :D
